title: Yasuo e q bug?
body: i found this bug long time ago, but not sure if this really Is a bug or it designed to be, i play a lot of yasuo, there was one time that i was trying to use e q clean a wave, i got the third stack on me so they will be knocked up, and they did,  but i also realised there is a minion on the edge got knocked up, but didnt take any damage?? And then that happened again during my rank game, i was trying to do some exchange by using e  q on a minon and enemy  malzaha was right next to it, i also got the third stack with me, he got knocked up, but it also didnt do any  damage to him, i used the minon to get close to him so i am sure he didnt take any damage from my q, but he did got knocked up, so is it a bug or they really dont take damage if they are on the edge of it

replies.body: Yasuo's E and Q interactions have always been a little buggy. For example, sometimes when I E+Q straight away, it doesnt do the Q at all and simply E's me to the destination, leaving me in a bad situation because people have reacted and moved before I can reposition for a good Q.

ye its a bug and it happens, report it they don't do anything

reported it like a month ago along with the other 2 bugs, still haven't done anything
